location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 25: Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: In this letter Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, encloses a translation of a letter from His Royal Highness the Prince of Shiraz [Ḥusayn ‘Alī Mīrzā], dated March 1824 and received 2 April 1824. The letter is a response to an earlier letter from Stannus (see ff 24v-25), which attempted to make amends for a letter of remonstrance from Captain Henry Hardy.
